description: A small backpack.  Good storage for a little encumbrance.
A large sized hiking backpack with plenty of storage space.
A huge fabric backpack made mostly as a joke before the Cataclysm.  Now, it's still rather silly, but it can store a lot of stuff.
A small leather backpack.  Good storage for a little encumbrance.
A large tactical multi-compartment backpack that has great lower back support.
A plastic basket meant for storing and hauling clothing.
Also known as a "bigpack", this rucksack is prized by pack rats but may lead to a bad back.
You're ready for a trip down some train tracks.  Also known as a hobo stick.
A makeshift backpack comprised of a wooden box and a pair of ropes.
Useful for carrying money, documents, or smuggled goods.
Useful to carry your precious musical instrument around protected from any harm.
An ultralight nylon backpack intended for one-day hiking trips.  Waterproof, slim, and spacious.
//: REI Co-op 22-liter daypack costs $54.95, so ballpark to $55

description: A lightweight mesh backpack, commonly worn by swimmers and divers.
A huge duffel bag.  Provides plenty of storage, but is severely encumbering.
An expandable pouch secured with straps.  Provides a bit of extra storage with minimal encumbrance.
Provides a bit of extra storage, with minimal encumbrance.
A tall canvas and plastic bag with fold-out legs used for golfing.  It even has straps to be worn on the back and a slot for an umbrella.
//: The main section of the golf bag actually assumes things will stick out of it, but specifically contains them, so some extra wiggle room was added.

description: The raw skin of an animal, quickly turned into a makeshift bag for storage.  It will still rot, and needs to be cured and tanned.
The raw skin of a monster, quickly turned into a makeshift bag for storage.  It will still rot, and needs to be cured and tanned.

This is a plain, hard-sided black briefcase with a trigger in the handle and a concealed hole in the side.  Squeezing the trigger would currently do nothing, as it is empty.  Don't forget to put a suitable MP5 back inside before you try to pay any ransom fees with lead.
A jerrycan modified to be worn in a similar manner to a backpack.
A bag stitched together from leather scraps.  Doesn't hold an awful lot but is easy to wear.
A set of pouches that can be worn on the thighs using buckled straps.  This variety is favored by the military.
A small pouch that can be worn on the upper arm using buckled straps.  This is a favoured item among sports & camping enthusiasts.
A pair of pants with the bottom ends tied with string, and then passed through the belt loops so the knapsack can be carried on the back.
A large sheet tied into a crude, over-the-shoulder sling.

//: KA101's ran about $90 but is ballistic nylon.  Bit tougher than the DDA model.
description: Light and easy to wear, but doesn't offer much storage.
The Modular Lightweight Load-carrying Equipment is an advanced military backpack.  Covered with pockets and straps, it strikes a fine balance between storage space and encumbrance.
A bag woven together from strings, with straps to wear it on back.  Lighter than a standard backpack, but more awkward to carry when loaded and unable to hold small or heavy items.
Before the Cataclysm this would allow your four-legged friend to see the world, now it's used to shield them from the world.
A bag used to carry groceries home.
A bit cumbersome to wear, but provides some storage.
A makeshift bag, cobbled together from rags.  Really gets in the way, but provides a decent amount of storage.
A huge military rucksack, provides a lot of storage.
The obvious choice for outdoor athletes, this ergonomic backpack is light and easy to wear, ensuring comfort when carrying heavy and bulky items.

//: Depends on if you're getting a cheap school version or something more like a range bag.
description: A simple single-sling backpack.  Easier to access than a normal backpack, but can't comfortably hold as much.
Hand made straw basket.  Carry it with you for extra storage.

//: You drag it along with you, so it taking a hit is Rare.
description: A huge wheeled suitcase used mainly for transporting clothes and other possessions during trips, provides a decent amount of storage but hauling it around is neither fast nor comfortable.
A mid-sized wheeled suitcase used mainly for transporting clothes and other possessions during trips, provides a decent amount of storage but hauling it around is not exactly comfortable.
A custom-built heavy duffel bag.  Durable and carefully crafted to hold as much stuff as possible.
A custom-built backpack.  Durable and carefully crafted to hold as much stuff as possible.
A custom-built heavy backpack.  Durable and carefully crafted to hold as much stuff as possible.
A custom-built lightweight runner pack.  Durable and carefully crafted to hold as much stuff as possible.
A large canvas sack, re-purposed for makeshift storage.  Goes well with a striped shirt and a domino mask.
A hiking pack used for short trips.
A light vest covered in pockets and straps for storage.
A large handmade straw basket with a lid and shoulder straps to wear it like a backpack.  Less comfortable than a proper backpack, but will do the job.
A pocket universe.  Can store approximately 384 * 10^6 bugs.
A long duffel bag.  Provides storage for long arms and rifles.  Quite cumbersome.
A long soft rifle case.  Provides storage for long arms and rifles.  Includes a small pocket, strap and handle.
A long soft leather rifle case.  Provides storage for long arms and rifles.  Includes a small pocket, strap and handle.
A long soft rifle case.  Provides storage for 2 long arms and rifles.  Includes 3 accessory pockets and a strap.
A long soft leather rifle case.  Provides storage for 2 long arms and rifles.  Includes 3 accessory pockets and a strap.
An extra long soft leather rifle case.  Provides storage for long arms and rifles.  Includes a small pocket, strap and handle.
A simple bag used to hold a camera, with a small pocket on the side for accessories.  Comes with a carry strap.
